original_text: Indeed Herod and Pontius Pilate met together with the Gentiles and the people of Israel in this city to conspire against your holy servant Jesus, whom you anointed.
korean_text: 과연 헤롯과 본디오 빌라도는 이방인과 이스라엘 백성과 합세하여 하나님께서 기름 부으신 거룩한 종 예수를 거슬러

sentences.original_text: Indeed Herod and Pontius Pilate met together
sentences.korean_translation: 실로로 헤롯과 본디오 빌라도가 함께 모였고

sentences.original_text: with the Gentiles and the people of Israel
in this city to conspire against
